alert.note: Alert for Hopkins (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 30 at 6:13PM EDT until June 30 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Hopkins County in northwestern Kentucky... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 512 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Madisonville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Madisonville, Earlington, Mortons Gap and Hanson. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 105 and 121. Western Kentucky Parkway near Mile Marker 39, and between Mile Markers 41 and 43. Pennyrile Parkway near Mile Marker 34. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
